duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead the social media strategy from inception to completion, aligning with overall business objectives and target audience.
Create and manage a content calendar for social media platforms, ensuring regular and engaging content that resonates with the target audience.
Identify and analyze social media trends, industry insights, and competition to develop effective strategies to enhance brand awareness and engagement.
Respond quickly to trends, ensuring the company stays current and seizes opportunities for engagement via all social media platforms.
Own all metrics related to social media, including gathering, analyzing, and reporting monthly and quarterly performance recaps to optimize future campaigns and strategies.
Special focus on Influencer Marketing, mainly in correspondence with Influencer agencies, in sourcing the right partners for the brand and recommending influencers when relevant.
Collaborate with the Growth Marketing team on shared opportunities on paid channels.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Marketing or a related field
